attributes.action: Exclude the ‘EXCLUDED’ from any income tax rises due to Furlough grants!!
attributes.additional_details: As I am one of the 3 million ‘EXCLUDED’ and did not receive any financial assistance which so many enjoyed by means of ‘FURLOUGH’ and ‘SEISS’ I need support in fighting any income tax rises that may be introduced in the new year. Why should we the EXCLUDED be penalised for other peoples windfalls. When the government introduces these new income tax rises they will no doubt want to change our stature to ‘THE INCLUDED’ let us fight for fairness and be made exempt of any such rises ‘STAY EXCLUDED’
attributes.background: Exclude the 3 million self employed from any income tax rises and reductions in personal allowances that are already being planned for the new year according to comments on BBC NEWS.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/312359
